summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northwest from West 42" Street to West 45" Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 23080, creating Local Improvement District No. 2243 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
